trans-unit.source: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.

trans-unit.source: Windows Store app marketing guidelines
trans-unit.target: Windows Store app marketing guidelines

trans-unit.source: Windows Store app marketing guidelines
trans-unit.target: Windows Store app marketing guidelines

trans-unit.source: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.

trans-unit.source: Store badges
trans-unit.target: Store badges

trans-unit.source: We’ve created special promotional badges to help you drive more customers to your app's listing within the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: We’ve created special promotional badges to help you drive more customers to your app's listing within the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: These badges are available in 44 languages.
trans-unit.target: These badges are available in 44 languages.

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that there are certain requirements you need to follow when using these images; these requirements, along with usage examples and guidelines, are available in a PDF file.
trans-unit.target: Keep in mind that there are certain requirements you need to follow when using these images; these requirements, along with usage examples and guidelines, are available in a PDF file.

trans-unit.source: [![Download button](images/downloadbutton.png)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529769) Windows Store Marketing Guidelines (PDF, English)
trans-unit.target: [![Download button](images/downloadbutton.png)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529769) Windows Store Marketing Guidelines (PDF, English)

trans-unit.source: Badge generator and images
trans-unit.target: Badge generator and images

trans-unit.source: You can use our [badge generator](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=534236) to generate HTML that displays the Store badge (in the language of your choice) and links directly to your app's Store listing.
trans-unit.target: You can use our [badge generator](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=534236) to generate HTML that displays the Store badge (in the language of your choice) and links directly to your app's Store listing.

trans-unit.source: You can also download the complete set of badge images (in PNG and PDF format) from the link below.
trans-unit.target: You can also download the complete set of badge images (in PNG and PDF format) from the link below.

trans-unit.source: [![Download button](images/downloadbutton.png)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529771) All badge images
trans-unit.target: [![Download button](images/downloadbutton.png)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529771) All badge images

trans-unit.source: Device images
trans-unit.target: Device images

trans-unit.source: To promote your app, you may want to show how it looks when running on a Windows device.
trans-unit.target: To promote your app, you may want to show how it looks when running on a Windows device.

trans-unit.source: We’ve got a variety of device chassis images for you to select from, including phones, tablets, laptops and PCs.
trans-unit.target: We’ve got a variety of device chassis images for you to select from, including phones, tablets, laptops and PCs.

trans-unit.source: Best practices and technical specifications for how to use these images can be found in the [Windows Store Marketing Guidelines](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529769).
trans-unit.target: Best practices and technical specifications for how to use these images can be found in the [Windows Store Marketing Guidelines](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529769).

trans-unit.source: [![Download button](images/downloadbutton.png)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=533057) Windows device art
trans-unit.target: [![Download button](images/downloadbutton.png)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=533057) Windows device art

trans-unit.source: License to Microsoft Marks
trans-unit.target: License to Microsoft Marks

trans-unit.source: *Microsoft Marks* means the *Microsoft badge* and the *Windows Store tile* described on the [badge generator](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=534236) page.
trans-unit.target: *Microsoft Marks* means the *Microsoft badge* and the *Windows Store tile* described on the [badge generator](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=534236) page.

trans-unit.source: To use these badges, you must:
trans-unit.target: To use these badges, you must:

trans-unit.source: Have your app or other content available in the Windows Store, or be part of the [Microsoft Affiliate Program](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=624463).
trans-unit.target: Have your app or other content available in the Windows Store, or be part of the [Microsoft Affiliate Program](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=624463).

trans-unit.source: If you are registered with Dev Center, comply with the [“License to Microsoft Marks”](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh694058.aspx#license_to_mark) section of the App Developer Agreement.
trans-unit.target: If you are registered with Dev Center, comply with the [“License to Microsoft Marks”](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh694058.aspx#license_to_mark) section of the App Developer Agreement.

trans-unit.source: If you are not registered with Windows Dev Center, Microsoft grants you a worldwide, nonexclusive, nontransferable, royalty-free license to use the badges solely as described in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: If you are not registered with Windows Dev Center, Microsoft grants you a worldwide, nonexclusive, nontransferable, royalty-free license to use the badges solely as described in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft may change these guidelines, but if it does, Microsoft will use reasonable means to redirect you to any new URLs where these specifications are posted.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft may change these guidelines, but if it does, Microsoft will use reasonable means to redirect you to any new URLs where these specifications are posted.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft reserves all rights not expressly granted herein.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft reserves all rights not expressly granted herein.

trans-unit.source: Follow the logo usage specifications described in the [Windows Store Marketing Guidelines](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529769).
trans-unit.target: Follow the logo usage specifications described in the [Windows Store Marketing Guidelines](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529769).

trans-unit.source: Microsoft is the sole owner of the Microsoft Marks and associated goodwill, and the sole beneficiary of the goodwill associated with your use of the Microsoft Marks.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft is the sole owner of the Microsoft Marks and associated goodwill, and the sole beneficiary of the goodwill associated with your use of the Microsoft Marks.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft may revoke this license at any time and at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft may revoke this license at any time and at its sole discretion.
